def select_points(message="Select multiple points."):
    """Select multiple points in the Rhino view.

    Parameters
    ----------
    message : str, optional
        Instruction for the user.

    Returns
    -------
    list[System.Guid]
        The identifers of the selected points.

    """
    return rs.GetObjects(message, preselect=True, select=True, group=False, filter=rs.filter.point)

#! python 3
import Rhino
import rhinoscriptsyntax as rs

guids = rs.GetObjects("Select points", filter=rs.filter.point, group=False, preselect=True, select=True)
points = []
for guid in guids:
  point_obj = Rhino.RhinoDoc.ActiveDoc.Objects.Find(guid)
  point = Rhino.RhinoDoc.ActiveDoc.Objects.Find(guid)
  points.append(point_obj.Geometry.Location)

print(points)
